Liverpool are eyeing a move for teenage Dutch defender Xavier Mbuyamba - touted as the next Virgil van Dijk.

According to Voetbal International, Liverpool are amongst a host of clubs tracking him, as well as Celtic, Bayern Munich, FC Porto and Chelsea .

Mbuyamba on trial with Chelsea - but Liverpool are keen to swoop and take advantage of the Blues' transfer ban which could cause them to miss out on the talented youngster this summer.

replies.msg:
Liverpool set to miss out on around €25million (£21.7m) if Philippe Coutinho is sold by Barcelona this summer.

Barca signed Coutinho from Liverpool in January last year for an initial €120m (£104.1m) deal plus an additional €40m (£34.7m) in variables.

Barcelona have paid just €15m (£13m) in add-ons so far: €5m (£4.33m) after he reached 25 games for the club and a further €10m (£8.67m) for helping the team secure Champions League qualification in his two seasons at Camp Nou.
